title: Electrostatics - force on charge from 2 charges

content.question: Which of the following expressions correctly describes the magnitude and direction of the force on Particle <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> due to the other two charged particles?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 k times Q squared, and denominator d squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator k times Q squared, and denominator d squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative of the fraction with numerator k times Q squared, and denominator d squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow></mpadded></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative of the fraction with numerator 3 k times Q squared, and denominator d squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow></mpadded></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator k times Q squared, and denominator d squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
